articles.title: Mysterious rumblings from inside of Mars detected by NASA lander - Sky News

articles.title: Helicopter lands on Mars as NASA prepares for the Ingenuity to make first powered flight on planet - Daily Mail
articles.description: A helicopter landed on Martian soil on Saturday as NASA prepares for the $85 million Ingenuity to make its first flight on the Red Planet in the first test of powered flight on Mars.
articles.content:
A helicopter was dropped on Martian soil on Saturday from the Perseverance rover as NASA prepares for the Ingenuity to make its first flight on the Red Planet.

articles.description: Nasa's InSight lander, bottom right, recorded two  'Marsquakes' on the Red Planet using its onboard seismometer, left, in an area known for its volcanic activity where landslides, top right, have been seen.
articles.content:
